response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs, is priced at $1,150,000. Given its worth to you is estimated at $1,200,000, this offer presents a unique chance to secure it at a competitive price. We believe in fostering long-term relationships and are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you require any further information or have questions about the product's capabilities and benefits. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1150000}
